casebody.data:
Second Department,

June, 1957

(June 3, 1957) Hercules Corrugated Box Corporation, Plaintiff, and Irving Berkowitz, Appellant, v. Aaron Berkowitz et al., Respondents, et al., Defendant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Nolan, P. J., Murphy, Ughetta, Hallinan and Kleinfeld, JJ. [See 3 A D 2d 841.]
